backend/main.mo: Defines core data types and state for reviews, articles, bikes, comments, ratings, profiles, and storage with admin‑gated seeding logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries for numerous frontend React components and pages.
frontend/.deploy-retry-trigger: Marker file indicating a deployment retry attempt with timestamp and reason.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Documentation describing procedures for retrying failed deployments and validation steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with about info, category links, region list, social icons, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Navigation header with logo, categories, search, region selector, auth button, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Wraps the app with region context and renders header, footer, outlet content, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Login/logout button tied to Internet Identity with query cache clearing and basic error handling.
frontend/src/components/BikeCard.tsx: Displays a bike preview card with image, region badge, specs, price range, and navigation to the bike page.
frontend/src/components/BikeForm.tsx: Form for creating or editing bikes including images, pricing, region, colors, brand logo, and markdown spec parsing.
frontend/src/components/BikeImageGallery: Cycling image gallery with navigation arrows, thumbnails, error fallback, and optional expand callback.
frontend/src/components/BikeSelector.tsx: Popover-based searchable selector for choosing a bike from a list.
frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx: Grid of category cards linking to content sections with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/CommentsPanel.ts: Displays and manages comments for a review, including posting, listing, and moderation actions.
Shows a side‑by‑side bike comparison table with specs and optional review-based scoring.
frontend/src/components/ImageLightbox.ts: Provides a modal image viewer with navigation, keyboard support, and error fallback.
frontend/src/components/LatestLaunchesCa: Renders a carousel of recent launches with titles, regions, previews, and links to article pages.
frontend/src/components/ModerationMenu.t: Offers admin/owner actions for comments, including hide and delete with confirmation.
frontend/src/components/PaletteSwatchEdi: Dialog for editing a hex color swatch with validation and live preview.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts new authenticated users to enter name and optional bio before continuing.
frontend/src/components/RatingWidget.tsx: Displays average user rating for a review and allows authenticated users to rate using stars.
frontend/src/components/RegionFilter.tsx: Provides a tab-based UI for selecting a content region filter.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuthActio: Wraps actions requiring authentication and prompts users to sign in if not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/ScoreBreakdown.t: Shows individual score categories and overall score using progress bars.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides current user authentication state, profile, and admin role info.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, state persistence, and login/logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating articles, reviews, and related data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegionContext.tsx: Stores and provides the selected region with sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with query and identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single article’s details with loading states and navigation back to its category.
frontend/src/pages/BikeDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed motorcycle info, handles invalid IDs, loads images, and supports color-based image selection with a lightbox.
frontend/src/pages/BrandDetailPage.tsx: Shows all bikes for a specific brand, including brand logo, with loading states and navigation back to the brand list.
frontend/src/pages/BrandsPage.tsx: Lists all motorcycle brands with search and logo handling, grouping bikes by brand.
frontend/src/pages/BuyingGuideDetailPage: Displays a single buying guide with metadata, checklist, and fallback when not found.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Lists articles or reviews by category and region with filtering, loading states, and review score display.
frontend/src/pages/ComparePage.tsx: Allows selecting two bikes and displays a side-by-side comparison using specs and reviews.
frontend/src/pages/CreateArticlePage.tsx: Form page for creating or saving articles with fields, validation, and submit handling.
frontend/src/pages/CreateReviewPage.tsx: Form page for creating or saving motorcycle reviews with bike selection, scoring sliders, and submit logic.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home dashboard showing hero section, latest launches, trending reviews, and category links using fetched data.
frontend/src/pages/ManageBikesPage.tsx: Authenticated UI for viewing, creating, editing, deleting, and seeding user bike listings.
frontend/src/pages/MyDraftsPage.tsx: Displays and manages a user's draft articles and reviews with publish actions and fallback prompts.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single review with bike details, scores, comments, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SearchResultsPage.tsx: Searches articles, reviews, and bikes, grouping matches and showing brand filters.
frontend/src/pages/SectionPalettesPage.t: Manages sections with autogenerated color palettes, allowing adding, editing, and removing colors.
frontend/src/utils/markdownSpecs.ts: Parses Markdown tables to extract specs text, price ranges, and colors with validation.
frontend/src/utils/sectionPalette.ts: Detects colors in text and generates hex-based palettes with variants and validation helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash routing) and storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage with optional persistence and cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, including issues and feature requests to fix Create Bike submission and remove the global color‑palette bar.
